body.name: Tpsmtdis 15.6" Portable Monitor,1080P Screen Extender Plug&Play IPS FHD Laptop Second Monitors,HDR USB-C HDMI Travel Gaming Display for PC Mac Phone PS4/5 Switch Xbox,w/Smart Cover Dual Speakers
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 18 mins
features: 【FHD 1080 Portable Monitor】 15.6" frosted monitor offers stunning 1920 x 1080 resolution, IPS screen with Ultra HDR option, 178° wide viewing angle, it reduces blue light radiation damage, flicker-free, protects your eyes from fatigue.n damage, flicker-free, protects your eyes from fatigue.slim, make it easy to carry, handy, best for travelling.

【Wide range of applications】 The 15.6" portable monitor with USB C, mini HDMI and USB ports can be easily connected to a laptop, PC, cell phone, PS3/PS4/PS5, XBOX ONE or switch as well as a mouse and keyboard to play business presentations, games, videos, TV shows, photos and more.

【Multiple Display Modes】This USB C portable monitor features impressive plug-and-play functionality with no driver installation required. Support mirroring and split screen modes to enhance your productivity and gaming fun, perfect for dual monitors or a third screen.

【Smart Design and Case】Portable Monitor Original protective cover, it has a durable PU leather look, it is strong enough to fold into 3 different positions to form a stand to protect the screen, only 1.8 lbs net weight and 0.39 inches thin, making it easy to carry, convenient and best for travel.
【Hassle-free service】Risk-free free trial for laptop monitor, if you have any problem with your Tpsmtdis portable monitor, please contact us for technical support or replacement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Extend Screen & Copy Screen This laptop screen extender is an excellent working partner and an entertainment life tool, phone connection can broaden your screen, laptop connection can screen share or have 2 different screens. Extend Screen & Copy Screen This laptop screen extender is an excellent working partner and an entertainment life tool, phone connection can broaden your screen, laptop connection can screen share or have 2 different screens. Computer & Mobile phone Online Learning Monitor The portable monitor features a 0.3inch ultra-slim profile(2.1lb), it is easy to slide into your bag, and allows you to carry it everywhere, ideal for a simple on-the-go dual-monitor setup or extending your phone screen. Comfortable gaming monitor Mini HDMI & USB C ports design makes this portable gaming monitor more convenient to connect your laptop, smartphone, PC, PS5, PS4, XBOX ONE, or Switch etc.

1920 x 1080 P Monitor preferred A+ grade screen, HDR mode can take the picture to a whole new level, giving you brighter highlights, stronger contrast, deeper and truer colors, more lifelike images for an amazing viewing/gaming experience.

NOTE: 1.The initial brightness of the display is 50% in the USB-C 1-line connection mode, if you want to adjust the brightness and volume to more than 50%, please make sure that an external power supply of 5V/2.0A or above is connected, Operation via the menu keys on the monitor. 2.Most laptops/mobile phones with USB-C full-featured interface can use Tpsmtdis monitors, but not all, please check if the Type-C ports of your laptop and mobile phone are compatible with audio and video signals. 3.If there is no external power supply, the mobile phone will supply power to the display, please ensure that the mobile phone has enough power supply, if there is no signal, please plug in the external power supply (5V/2.0A), the external power supply must be connected in HDMI connection mode. 4.Phones without a full-featured Type C port require an adapter to connect. (IOS devices need a Lightning to HDMI adapter) 5.The bluetooth keyboard and mouse require a bluetooth connection from the phone/laptop. It can also be connected via the OTG port, make sure the device has a USB-C port. 6.The ultra-thin monitor doesn't have a battery, so can't remember settings, but it's quick and easy to set up. 7.The smart cover can protect the screen very well. Please use the smart cover when you go out. 8.When connecting to a mobile phone, only some apps support landscape mode. As the monitor itself is not charged, it is the same as the monitor on your home computer. It requires external power supply and external signal source to function properly. Therefore, please ensure that your device is powered on and connected to your signal source properly. Is HDMI plugged in or connected to devices such as mobile phones so that it can function properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Got tired of hauling up a monitor when I occasionally work from home. This is so much easier. The picture on this is sharp; better than my laptop. No issues with install; plug-and-play. My home PC requires both the C-type cord and the HDMI cord for power and picture. My work laptop has a Thunderbolt C-type, so I only need that one cord for both power and picture. I didn't have to make any adjustments at all. Menus are easy to operate. The sound was a bit low from the speakers, but I generally have headphones hooked up. All in all, I'm super pleased with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take your office with you
reviews.reviewText: Portable, sturdy, well designed, and easy to use. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as the cheapest portable monitor I could find on amazon. I wanted amazon customer support in case of defects, and my use case is primarily as a tool for troubleshooting other computers so my bar was low.To my surprise, the image is a sharp and warm color temp LCD. The while it only has the single backlight, the HDR effect does give the image a bit more pop so its pleasant to look at. It uses very low power, so it can be powered by a USB port on the pc itself, and if it has thunderbolt support you can just use the 1 c - c cable.No issues yet, and makes some of projects a bit easier as its way less cumbersome than a full desktop display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it is convenient and user-friendly, and having multiple cable options makes it even easier, elegant packing and is lightweight, have been looking for a portable 2nd screen for a long and I am happy I got to get this one, recommending.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very clear and easy to set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size, lightweight
reviews.reviewText: Tablet’s resolution is pretty good for the price, it’s also lightweight so easy to add to my laptop bag & doesn’t need too much to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NO RESOLUTION FOR PRODUCTED DEFECT
reviews.reviewText: 2/9/24 - STILL NO RESOLUTION and now my other monitor is starting to flash hear and there, disconnecting and reconnecting ... the port is loose and I've explain this to seller and Amazon and the only option was a refund that removes a restock fee which will not leave enough money to replace.... very upsetUpdate.... as of 1/29/24 ... still no resolution .... even contacted Amazon directly ... now my work is suffering...the product was supposed to have warranty and all they keep doing is going around and around with the same request for me to troubleshoot... in which I had already tried including a replacement hdmi mini to regular cord ... and trying to connect with the type c cord does work either... I have follow my manually well. But I guess I'm out 80+ dollars ... thanks so muchMINI HDMI STOPPED WORKING AND EMAILED SELLER WITH NO RESOLUTION GIVEN - ALSO CONTACTED AMAZON AND NOTHING THRU THEM EITHER AND ALL I WANTED WAS IT REPAIRED OR REPLACE BECAUSE THE OTHER WORKS FINE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: The image quality isn't incredible, sometimes I'll have some rogue pixels when an image is displayed (shown in photo) but for the price and for what I need it for, I'm pretty pleased. Great for WFH workers who travel. Plug and play, very easy to use.
